job.title: Site Reliability Engineer- 100% Remote
job.description:
Are you a talented SRE looking for a company that will value your skills and give you interesting projects to own? This company has built a major SaaS product that focuses on mitigating risk and driving business insights. They have amazing document management solutions for law firms and academic institutions. Lots of analytics involved with the company too.

They are a few thousand employees and are profitable and scaling! This venture is a super exciting one - they are spending $50mil to migrate their systems from AWS to Azure. It’s become the ideal solution for them and they are committing to it.

They are hiring SRE’s to help them with this transition. You should be skilled with AWS or Azure, who have experience with Terraform or Cloudformation (or any IaC tool), and any containerization is a plus as they will be using Kubernetes within the new setup. Everyone will be hired on a contract to hire (will be 6-12 months) as that’s how they’ve hired everyone (we’ve placed over 25 people with them and have a 95% conversion rate, so it’s truly a contract to hire). Great quality of life, strong benefits (up to 9% 401k match), high PTO and great perks. 100% remote.

Required Skills & Experience
  • AWS or Azure experience
  • Terraform or Cloudformation
  • Kubernetes and Docker
The Offer:
  • Competitive Salary: Up to $75/ HR W2
You will receive the following benefits:
  • Competitive Health Insurance
  • 401k- up to 9% match
  • Remote schedule
  • Tuition reimbursement
  • Pet Insurance
Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis now and in the future.

Posted By: Alyssa Valles
